name: vimium-c
description: A keyboard shortcut tool for keyboard-based page navigation and browser tab operations with an advanced omnibar and global shortcuts

scripts.legacy: bash -c "BUILD_MinCVer=${BUILD_MinCVer:-32} BUILD_BTypes=1 LOCAL_DIST=${LOCAL_DIST:-dist} BUILD_NDEBUG=0 gulp local2
scripts.latest: bash -c "BUILD_MinCVer=73 BUILD_BTypes=1 LOCAL_DIST=${LOCAL_DIST:-dist} BUILD_NDEBUG=0 gulp local2
scripts.latest-edge: bash -c "BUILD_MinCVer=53 BUILD_BTypes=4 LOCAL_DIST=${LOCAL_DIST:-dist} BUILD_NDEBUG=0 gulp local2
scripts.chrome: bash -c "BUILD_MinCVer=38 BUILD_BTypes=1 NEED_COMMIT=1 gulp dist && IN_DIST=1 ./scripts/make.sh"
scripts.firefox: bash -c "BUILD_MinFFVer=63 BUILD_PContentSettings=0 BUILD_BTypes=2 NEED_COMMIT=1 gulp dist && IN_DIST=1 ./scripts/make.sh"
scripts.edge-c: bash -c "BUILD_MinCVer=73 BUILD_BTypes=1 BUILD_EdgeC=1 NEED_COMMIT=1 gulp dist && IN_DIST=1 FOR_EDGE=1 ./scripts/make.sh"
scripts.zip-d: bash -c "DEBUG=1 ENABLE_SOURCE_MAP=1 gulp dist && IN_DIST=1 WITH_MAP=1 ./scripts/make.sh"

author: gdh1995
